title: Newcastle Fans Don't Get to Choose (with Metro Mayor Jamie Driscoll)
itunes:title: Newcastle Fans Don't Get to Choose (with Metro Mayor Jamie Driscoll)
description:
Newcastle United fans are jubilant at more investment in their club, according to Jamie Driscoll, mayor of the North of Tyne Combined Authority. But he says they are not responsible for Saudi Arabia's human rights record and that should not be the tone of coverage.

Plus: Bloomberg's Brussels Bureau Chief Kevin Whitelaw and reporter Peter Flanagan in Dublin discuss the next moves on the Northern Ireland protocol, with Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Caroline Hepker.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
